title: Ore No Karada Wa Nande Onna Nanda?
alternative_title: 俺の身体はなんで女なんだ? ; Why is My Body Female?
status: 俺の身体はなんで女なんだ? ; Why is My Body Female?
description:
Description :
        "I'm jealous of real men..." Ryutaro Suzumiya, an undefeated lawyer, is a transgender man who is registered as female. As a lawyer, Ryutaro stands in court to protect the weak! However, his real problem is that he has been in love with Natsuki Takaoka, his secretary, former classmate, and best friend for over 10 years. Although Ryutaro and Natsuki are the close with each other, they are the furthest from being lovers. An ambitious work that depicts Ryutaro, who has a male heart but a female body, living as a transgender man while struggling with his relationship to Natsuki!
